# EventGroup.Null field

A special null event group that can be used to stop the [`CurrentEventGroup`](../Actor/CurrentEventGroup) from being passed along when [`CreateActor`](../Actor/CreateActor) or [`SendEvent`](../Actor/SendEvent) is invoked.

```csharp
public static EventGroup Null;
```
